Raster Factory¶

class RasterFactory.RasterFactory[source]¶

Creates raster view from point set based on a certain property (e.g. range, intesity, etc.) The panoramic view is stored as a PanoramProperty object

Attributes

Methods

CreateRaster(points[, _property, …])
param points: The point set to create the raster from can be either a PointSet, PointSubSet or any other BaseProperty-derived objects
CreateRaster(points, _property='Z', gridSpacing=0.05, interpolationMethod='linear')[source]¶
Parameters:
  • points – The point set to create the raster from can be either a PointSet, PointSubSet or any other BaseProperty-derived objects
  • gridSpacing – the spacing between grid
  • interpolationMethod – method of interpolation. {‘linear’, ‘nearest’, ‘cubic’}
  • _property – The property to create the panorama according to. Now only applicable with range
Returns:

raster property
